de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class ApplicationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.ApplicationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    @Component
public final class ApplicationProperties
extends java.util.Properties
    Our properties-class. Extends Properties. Sets up default properties loaded from the local serverpackcreator.properties and allows reloading of said properties if the file has changed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ApplicationProperties(FileUtilities fileUtilities, SystemUtilities systemUtilities, ListUtilities listUtilities)
      Initialize an instance of our application properties using the default serverpackcreator.properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplicationProperties

        @Autowired
public ApplicationProperties(FileUtilities fileUtilities,
                                        SystemUtilities systemUtilities,
                                        ListUtilities listUtilities)
        Initialize an instance of our application properties using the default serverpackcreator.properties.
        Parameters:
        fileUtilities - Instance of FileUtilities for file-operations.
        systemUtilities - Instance of SystemUtilities to acquire the Java path automatically.
        listUtilities - Used to print the configured fallback modlists in chunks.

      • ApplicationProperties

        public ApplicationProperties(java.io.File propertiesFile,
                             FileUtilities fileUtilities,
                             SystemUtilities systemUtilities,
                             ListUtilities listUtilities)
        Initialize an instance of our application properties using a custom properties-file.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - The properties file from which to load the settings and configuration.
        fileUtilities - Instance of FileUtilities for file-operations.
        systemUtilities - Instance of SystemUtilities to acquire the Java path automatically.
        listUtilities - Used to print the configured fallback modlists in chunks.

      • setJavaPath

        public void setJavaPath(java.lang.String javaPath)
        Setter for the path to the Java executable/binary. Replaces any occurrences of \ with /. The path to the Java executable or binary MUST NOT be a symbolic link, or link of any kind. It must be a direct path!
        Parameters:
        javaPath - The new Java path to store.

      • SERVERPACKCREATOR_VERSION

        public java.lang.String SERVERPACKCREATOR_VERSION()
        Getter for the version of ServerPackCreator.
        If a JAR-file compiled from a release-job from a CI/CD-pipeline is used, it should contain a VERSION.txt-file which contains the version of said release. If a non-release-version is used, from a regular pipeline or local dev-build, then this will be set to dev.
        Returns:
        String. Returns the version of ServerPackCreator.

        Returns:
        Array of modloaders supported by ServerPackCreator.

      • getListFallbackMods

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getListFallbackMods()
        Acquire the default fallback list of clientside-only mods. If de.griefed.serverpackcreator.serverpack.autodiscovery.filter is set to ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.REGEX, a regex fallback list is returned.
        Returns:
        The fallback list of clientside-only mods.

      • checkForAvailablePreReleases

        public boolean checkForAvailablePreReleases()
        Getter for whether the search for available PreReleases is enabled or disabled.
        Depending on de.griefed.serverpackcreator.versioncheck.prerelease, returns true if checks for available PreReleases are enabled, false if no checks for available PreReleases should be made.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Whether checks for available PreReleases are enabled.

      • getAikarsFlags

        public java.lang.String getAikarsFlags()
        Get this configurations AikarsFlags
        Returns:
        Aikars flags.

      • getFilesToExcludeFromZipArchive

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilesToExcludeFromZipArchive()
        List of files to be excluded from ZIP-archives. Current filters are:
        • MINECRAFT_VERSION - Will be replaced with the Minecraft version of the server pack
        • MODLOADER - Will be replaced with the modloader of the server pack
        • MODLOADER_VERSION - Will be replaced with the modloader version of the server pack

        Should you want these filters to be expanded, open an issue on GitHub

        Returns:
        Files and folders to exclude from the ZIP archive of a server pack.

      • isZipFileExclusionEnabled

        public boolean isZipFileExclusionEnabled()
        Whether the exclusion of files from the ZIP-archive of the server pack is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the exclusion is enabled.

      • isAutoExcludingModsEnabled

        public boolean isAutoExcludingModsEnabled()
        Is auto excluding of clientside-only mods enabled.
        Returns:
        true if autodiscovery is enabled.

      • updateFallback

        public boolean updateFallback()
        Update the fallback clientside-only modlist of our serverpackcreator.properties from the main-repository or one of its mirrors.
        Returns:
        true if the fallback-property was updated.

      • isDarkTheme

        public boolean isDarkTheme()
        Is the Dark Theme currently active?
        Returns:
        true if the Dark Theme is active, otherwise false.

      • setTheme

        public void setTheme(boolean dark)
        Set the current theme to Dark Theme or Light Theme.
        Parameters:
        dark - true to activate Dark Theme, false otherwise.

      • saveToDisk

        public void saveToDisk(java.io.File propertiesFile)
        Store the ApplicationProperties to disk, overwriting the existing one.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - The file to store the properties to.

        public boolean isServerPacksOverwriteEnabled()
        Whether overwriting of already existing server packs is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled.

        public boolean isServerPackCleanupEnabled()
        Whether cleanup procedures after server pack generation are enabled.
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled.

      • getLanguage

        public java.lang.String getLanguage()
        Get the currently set language.
        Returns:
        The language currently set and used.

      • getHasteBinServerUrl

        public java.lang.String getHasteBinServerUrl()
        Acquire this instances HasteBin server documents endpoint URL.
        Returns:
        URL to the HasteBin server documents endpoint.

      • enableMinecraftPreReleases

        public boolean enableMinecraftPreReleases()
        Whether Minecraft pre-releases and snapshots are available to the user in, for example, the GUI.
        Returns:
        true if they are available.

      • exclusionFilter

        public ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter exclusionFilter()
        The filter method with which to determine whether a user-specified clientside-only mod should be excluded from the server pack. Available settings are:
        • ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.START
        • ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.END
        • ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.CONTAIN
        • ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.REGEX
        • ApplicationProperties.ExclusionFilter.EITHER
        Returns:
        The filter method by which to exclude user-specified clientside-only mods.

      • javaPath

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> javaPath(int javaVersion)
        Get the path to the specified Java executable/binary, wrapped in an Optional for your convenience.
        Parameters:
        javaVersion - The Java version to acquire the path for.
        Returns:
        The path to the Java executable/binary, if available.

      • isJavaScriptAutoupdateEnabled

        public boolean isJavaScriptAutoupdateEnabled()
        Whether to automatically update the SPC_JAVA_SPC-placeholder in the script variables table with a Java path matching the required Java version for the Minecraft server.
        Returns:
        true if enabled.
